content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 18}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 51, "index": 33}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 60, "index": 34}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 24, "index": 44}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft stripped crimson hyphae, I need to place four stripped crimson stems in a square pattern on the crafting table. The first step is to move one stripped crimson stem from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 18}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 3, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 51, "index": 33}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 60, "index": 34}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 24, "index": 44}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I have already placed one stripped crimson stem in slot 1, so I will now move another one to slot 2, which is directly to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
